verses.kjv: Then came near the heads of the fathers of the Levites unto Eleazar the priest, and unto Joshua the son of Nun, and unto the heads of the fathers of the tribes of the children of Israel;
verses.web: Then the heads of fathers’ houses of the Levites came near to Eleazar the priest, and to Joshua the son of Nun, and to the heads of fathers’ houses of the tribes of the children of Israel.
verses.ct: The leaders of the Levite families came to Eleazar the priest, to Joshua son of Nun, and to the tribal leaders of Israel.

verses.kjv: And they spake unto them at Shiloh in the land of Canaan, saying, The LORD commanded by the hand of Moses to give us cities to dwell in, with the suburbs thereof for our cattle.
verses.web: They spoke to them at Shiloh in the land of Canaan, saying, “LORD commanded through Moses to give us cities to dwell in, with their pasture lands for our livestock.”
verses.ct: They met with them at Shiloh in the land of Canaan and said, "The LORD commanded through Moses that we be given cities to live in, along with surrounding pasturelands for our livestock."

verses.kjv: And the children of Israel gave unto the Levites out of their inheritance, at the commandment of the LORD, these cities and their suburbs.
verses.web: The children of Israel gave to the Levites out of their inheritance, according to the commandment of LORD, these cities with their pasture lands.
verses.ct: So, obeying the LORD's command, the Israelites gave the Levites the following cities and pasturelands from their own tribal territories.

verses.kjv: And the lot came out for the families of the Kohathites: and the children of Aaron the priest, which were of the Levites, had by lot out of the tribe of Judah, and out of the tribe of Simeon, and out of the tribe of Benjamin, thirteen cities.
verses.web: The lot came out for the families of the Kohathites. The children of Aaron the priest, who were of the Levites, had thirteen cities by lot out of the tribe of Judah, out of the tribe of the Simeonites, and out of the tribe of Benjamin.
verses.ct: The first lot went to the Kohathite families. Those among them who were descendants of Aaron the priest received 13 cities from the tribes of Judah, Simeon, and Benjamin.

verses.kjv: And the rest of the children of Kohath had by lot out of the families of the tribe of Ephraim, and out of the tribe of Dan, and out of the half tribe of Manasseh, ten cities.
verses.web: The rest of the children of Kohath had ten cities by lot out of the families of the tribe of Ephraim, out of the tribe of Dan, and out of the half-tribe of Manasseh.
verses.ct: The remaining Kohathite families received 10 cities from the tribes of Ephraim, Dan, and the half-tribe of Manasseh.

verses.kjv: And the children of Gershon had by lot out of the families of the tribe of Issachar, and out of the tribe of Asher, and out of the tribe of Naphtali, and out of the half tribe of Manasseh in Bashan, thirteen cities.
verses.web: The children of Gershon had thirteen cities by lot out of the families of the tribe of Issachar, out of the tribe of Asher, out of the tribe of Naphtali, and out of the half-tribe of Manasseh in Bashan.
verses.ct: The families of Gershon received 13 cities from the tribes of Issachar, Asher, Naphtali, and the half-tribe of Manasseh in Bashan.

verses.kjv: The children of Merari by their families had out of the tribe of Reuben, and out of the tribe of Gad, and out of the tribe of Zebulun, twelve cities.
verses.web: The children of Merari according to their families had twelve cities out of the tribe of Reuben, out of the tribe of Gad, and out of the tribe of Zebulun.
verses.ct: The families of Merari received 12 cities from the tribes of Reuben, Gad, and Zebulun.

verses.kjv: And the children of Israel gave by lot unto the Levites these cities with their suburbs, as the LORD commanded by the hand of Moses.
verses.web: The children of Israel gave these cities with their pasture lands by lot to the Levites, as LORD commanded by Moses.
verses.ct: The Israelites assigned all these cities and their pasturelands to the Levites by casting lots, just as the LORD had commanded through Moses.

verses.kjv: And they gave out of the tribe of the children of Judah, and out of the tribe of the children of Simeon, these cities which are here mentioned by name,
verses.web: They gave out of the tribe of the children of Judah, and out of the tribe of the children of Simeon, these cities which are mentioned by name:
verses.ct: From the tribes of Judah and Simeon, they gave the following cities listed by name.

verses.kjv: Which the children of Aaron, being of the families of the Kohathites, who were of the children of Levi, had: for theirs was the first lot.
verses.web: and they were for the children of Aaron, of the families of the Kohathites, who were of the children of Levi; for theirs was the first lot.
verses.ct: These went to the descendants of Aaron from the Kohathite families of the Levites, since they received the first allotment.

verses.kjv: And they gave them the city of Arba the father of Anak, which city is Hebron, in the hill country of Judah, with the suburbs thereof round about it.
verses.web: They gave them Kiriath Arba, named after the father of Anak (also called Hebron), in the hill country of Judah, with its pasture lands around it.
verses.ct: They gave them Kiriath Arba — that is, Hebron — in the hill country of Judah, along with its surrounding pasturelands. (Arba was the father of Anak.)

verses.kjv: But the fields of the city, and the villages thereof, gave they to Caleb the son of Jephunneh for his possession.
verses.web: But they gave the fields of the city and its villages to Caleb the son of Jephunneh for his possession.
verses.ct: However, the farmland and villages around the city had already been given to Caleb son of Jephunneh as his personal property.

verses.kjv: Thus they gave to the children of Aaron the priest Hebron with her suburbs, to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Libnah with her suburbs,
verses.web: To the children of Aaron the priest they gave Hebron with its pasture lands, the city of refuge for the man slayer, Libnah with its pasture lands,
verses.ct: So to the descendants of Aaron the priest they gave Hebron (which served as a city of refuge for anyone who accidentally killed someone), along with its pasturelands, and Libnah with its pasturelands,

verses.kjv: And Jattir with her suburbs, and Eshtemoa with her suburbs,
verses.web: Jattir with its pasture lands, Eshtemoa with its pasture lands,
verses.ct: Jattir with its pasturelands, Eshtemoa with its pasturelands,

verses.kjv: And Holon with her suburbs, and Debir with her suburbs,
verses.web: Holon with its pasture lands, Debir with its pasture lands,
verses.ct: Holon with its pasturelands, Debir with its pasturelands,

verses.kjv: And Ain with her suburbs, and Juttah with her suburbs, and Bethshemesh with her suburbs; nine cities out of those two tribes.
verses.web: Ain with its pasture lands, Juttah with its pasture lands, and Beth Shemesh with its pasture lands: nine cities out of those two tribes.
verses.ct: Ain with its pasturelands, Juttah with its pasturelands, and Beth Shemesh with its pasturelands — 9 cities from these 2 tribes.

verses.kjv: And out of the tribe of Benjamin, Gibeon with her suburbs, Geba with her suburbs,
verses.web: Out of the tribe of Benjamin, Gibeon with its pasture lands, Geba with its pasture lands,
verses.ct: From the tribe of Benjamin they received Gibeon with its pasturelands, Geba with its pasturelands,

verses.kjv: Anathoth with her suburbs, and Almon with her suburbs; four cities.
verses.web: Anathoth with its pasture lands, and Almon with its pasture lands: four cities.
verses.ct: Anathoth with its pasturelands, and Almon with its pasturelands — 4 cities.

verses.kjv: All the cities of the children of Aaron, the priests, were thirteen cities with their suburbs.
verses.web: All the cities of the children of Aaron, the priests, were thirteen cities with their pasture lands.
verses.ct: In total, the priests descended from Aaron received 13 cities with their pasturelands.

verses.kjv: And the families of the children of Kohath, the Levites which remained of the children of Kohath, even they had the cities of their lot out of the tribe of Ephraim.
verses.web: The families of the children of Kohath, the Levites, even the rest of the children of Kohath, had the cities of their lot out of the tribe of Ephraim.
verses.ct: The remaining Kohathite families among the Levites received their allotted cities from the tribe of Ephraim.

verses.kjv: For they gave them Shechem with her suburbs in mount Ephraim, to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Gezer with her suburbs,
verses.web: They gave them Shechem with its pasture lands in the hill country of Ephraim, the city of refuge for the man slayer, and Gezer with its pasture lands,
verses.ct: They were given Shechem (a city of refuge for anyone who accidentally killed someone) with its pasturelands in the hill country of Ephraim, and Gezer with its pasturelands,

verses.kjv: And Kibzaim with her suburbs, and Bethhoron with her suburbs; four cities.
verses.web: Kibzaim with its pasture lands, and Beth Horon with its pasture lands: four cities.
verses.ct: Kibzaim with its pasturelands, and Beth Horon with its pasturelands — 4 cities.

verses.kjv: And out of the tribe of Dan, Eltekeh with her suburbs, Gibbethon with her suburbs,
verses.web: Out of the tribe of Dan, Elteke with its pasture lands, Gibbethon with its pasture lands,
verses.ct: From the tribe of Dan they received Eltekeh with its pasturelands, Gibbethon with its pasturelands,

verses.kjv: Aijalon with her suburbs, Gathrimmon with her suburbs; four cities.
verses.web: Aijalon with its pasture lands, Gath Rimmon with its pasture lands: four cities.
verses.ct: Aijalon with its pasturelands, and Gath Rimmon with its pasturelands — 4 cities.

verses.kjv: And out of the half tribe of Manasseh, Tanach with her suburbs, and Gathrimmon with her suburbs; two cities.
verses.web: Out of the half-tribe of Manasseh, Taanach with its pasture lands, and Gath Rimmon with its pasture lands: two cities.
verses.ct: From the half-tribe of Manasseh they received Taanach with its pasturelands and Gath Rimmon with its pasturelands — 2 cities.

verses.kjv: All the cities were ten with their suburbs for the families of the children of Kohath that remained.
verses.web: All the cities of the families of the rest of the children of Kohath were ten with their pasture lands.
verses.ct: In total, the remaining Kohathite families received 10 cities with their pasturelands.

verses.kjv: And unto the children of Gershon, of the families of the Levites, out of the other half tribe of Manasseh they gave Golan in Bashan with her suburbs, to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Beeshterah with her suburbs; two cities.
verses.web: They gave to the children of Gershon, of the families of the Levites, out of the half-tribe of Manasseh Golan in Bashan with its pasture lands, the city of refuge for the man slayer, and Be Eshterah with its pasture lands: two cities.
verses.ct: The Gershonite families of the Levites received from the other half-tribe of Manasseh: Golan in Bashan (a city of refuge for anyone who accidentally killed someone) with its pasturelands, and Beeshterah with its pasturelands — 2 cities.

verses.kjv: And out of the tribe of Issachar, Kishon with her suburbs, Dabareh with her suburbs,
verses.web: Out of the tribe of Issachar, Kishion with its pasture lands, Daberath with its pasture lands,
verses.ct: From the tribe of Issachar they received Kishon with its pasturelands, Daberath with its pasturelands,

verses.kjv: Jarmuth with her suburbs, Engannim with her suburbs; four cities.
verses.web: Jarmuth with its pasture lands, En Gannim with its pasture lands: four cities.
verses.ct: Jarmuth with its pasturelands, and En Gannim with its pasturelands — 4 cities.

verses.kjv: And out of the tribe of Asher, Mishal with her suburbs, Abdon with her suburbs,
verses.web: Out of the tribe of Asher, Mishal with its pasture lands, Abdon with its pasture lands,
verses.ct: From the tribe of Asher they received Mishal with its pasturelands, Abdon with its pasturelands,

verses.kjv: Helkath with her suburbs, and Rehob with her suburbs; four cities.
verses.web: Helkath with its pasture lands, and Rehob with its pasture lands: four cities.
verses.ct: Helkath with its pasturelands, and Rehob with its pasturelands — 4 cities.

verses.kjv: And out of the tribe of Naphtali, Kedesh in Galilee with her suburbs, to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Hammothdor with her suburbs, and Kartan with her suburbs; three cities.
verses.web: Out of the tribe of Naphtali, Kedesh in Galilee with its pasture lands, the city of refuge for the man slayer, Hammothdor with its pasture lands, and Kartan with its pasture lands: three cities.
verses.ct: From the tribe of Naphtali they received Kedesh in Galilee (a city of refuge for anyone who accidentally killed someone) with its pasturelands, Hammoth Dor with its pasturelands, and Kartan with its pasturelands — 3 cities.

verses.kjv: All the cities of the Gershonites according to their families were thirteen cities with their suburbs.
verses.web: All the cities of the Gershonites according to their families were thirteen cities with their pasture lands.
verses.ct: In total, the Gershonite families received 13 cities with their pasturelands.

verses.kjv: And unto the families of the children of Merari, the rest of the Levites, out of the tribe of Zebulun, Jokneam with her suburbs, and Kartah with her suburbs,
verses.web: To the families of the children of Merari, the rest of the Levites, out of the tribe of Zebulun, Jokneam with its pasture lands, Kartah with its pasture lands,
verses.ct: The remaining Levite families — the descendants of Merari — received from the tribe of Zebulun: Jokneam with its pasturelands, Kartah with its pasturelands,

verses.kjv: Dimnah with her suburbs, Nahalal with her suburbs; four cities.
verses.web: Dimnah with its pasture lands, and Nahalal with its pasture lands: four cities.
verses.ct: Dimnah with its pasturelands, and Nahalal with its pasturelands — 4 cities.

verses.kjv: And out of the tribe of Reuben, Bezer with her suburbs, and Jahazah with her suburbs,
verses.web: Out of the tribe of Reuben, Bezer with its pasture lands, Jahaz with its pasture lands,
verses.ct: From the tribe of Reuben they received Bezer with its pasturelands, Jahazah with its pasturelands,

verses.kjv: Kedemoth with her suburbs, and Mephaath with her suburbs; four cities.
verses.web: Kedemoth with its pasture lands, and Mephaath with its pasture lands: four cities.
verses.ct: Kedemoth with its pasturelands, and Mephaath with its pasturelands — 4 cities.

verses.kjv: And out of the tribe of Gad, Ramoth in Gilead with her suburbs, to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Mahanaim with her suburbs,
verses.web: Out of the tribe of Gad, Ramoth in Gilead with its pasture lands, the city of refuge for the man slayer, and Mahanaim with its pasture lands,
verses.ct: From the tribe of Gad they received Ramoth in Gilead (a city of refuge for anyone who accidentally killed someone) with its pasturelands, Mahanaim with its pasturelands,

verses.kjv: Heshbon with her suburbs, Jazer with her suburbs; four cities in all.
verses.web: Heshbon with its pasture lands, Jazer with its pasture lands: four cities in all.
verses.ct: Heshbon with its pasturelands, and Jazer with its pasturelands — 4 cities in all.

verses.kjv: So all the cities for the children of Merari by their families, which were remaining of the families of the Levites, were by their lot twelve cities.
verses.web: All these were the cities of the children of Merari according to their families, even the rest of the families of the Levites. Their lot was twelve cities.
verses.ct: In total, the families of Merari — the last of the Levite families — received 12 cities by lot.

verses.kjv: All the cities of the Levites within the possession of the children of Israel were forty and eight cities with their suburbs.
verses.web: All the cities of the Levites among the possessions of the children of Israel were forty-eight cities with their pasture lands.
verses.ct: Altogether, the Levites received 48 cities with their pasturelands, scattered throughout the territory belonging to the other Israelite tribes.

verses.kjv: These cities were every one with their suburbs round about them: thus were all these cities.
verses.web: Each of these cities included their pasture lands around them. It was this way with all these cities.
verses.ct: Every one of these cities came with surrounding pasturelands — that was the arrangement for each of them.

verses.kjv: And the LORD gave unto Israel all the land which he sware to give unto their fathers; and they possessed it, and dwelt therein.
verses.web: So LORD gave to Israel all the land which he swore to give to their fathers. They possessed it, and lived in it.
verses.ct: So the LORD gave Israel the entire land he had sworn to give their ancestors. They took possession of it and settled there.

verses.kjv: And the LORD gave them rest round about, according to all that he sware unto their fathers: and there stood not a man of all their enemies before them; the LORD delivered all their enemies into their hand.
verses.web: LORD gave them rest all around, according to all that he swore to their fathers. Not a man of all their enemies stood before them. LORD delivered all their enemies into their hand.
verses.ct: The LORD gave them peace on every side, exactly as he had promised their ancestors. Not one of their enemies could stand against them — the LORD handed every enemy over to them.

verses.kjv: There failed not ought of any good thing which the LORD had spoken unto the house of Israel; all came to pass.
verses.web: Nothing failed of any good thing which LORD had spoken to the house of Israel. All came to pass.
verses.ct: Not a single one of the LORD's good promises to the people of Israel failed. Every one of them came true.
